hero.title: About
hero.subtitle: Tasami
hero.description: We're a dynamic startup team of passionate experts, dedicated to transforming businesses through innovative AI, automation, design, and marketing solutions.

beginning.title: The Beginning
beginning.description: Founded in 2024, Tasami emerged from a shared vision among passionate technologists who believed in the transformative power of AI and automation. We saw an opportunity to help businesses navigate the digital landscape with fresh perspectives and cutting-edge solutions.

approach.title: Our Approach
approach.description: As a new company, we bring the energy and innovation of a startup combined with decades of combined experience from our team members who have worked at top tech companies and successful startups. We're agile, focused, and deeply committed to each client's success.

promise.title: Our Promise
promise.description: Our lean structure allows us to provide personalized attention, faster response times, and cost-effective solutions while maintaining the highest quality standards. We're building the future of technology, one project at a time.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower businesses with cutting-edge technology solutions that drive growth, efficiency, and innovation. We believe technology should be accessible, understandable, and transformative for organizations of all sizes.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading technology partner that helps businesses navigate the digital landscape, leveraging AI, automation, and design to create a more efficient and connected world.

values.title: Our
values.subtitle: Values
values.description: The principles that guide everything we do and shape our company culture. These values are the foundation of our success.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly push the boundaries of what's possible with technology, always seeking innovative solutions to complex problems.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: We maintain the highest standards in everything we do, ensuring our solutions are robust, reliable, and performant.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We believe in the power of teamwork and work closely with our clients to achieve shared success.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.description: We maintain open communication and provide clear insights into our processes and progress.

values.cta: These values drive every decision we make

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Common questions about working with our startup team

questions.question: How long has your company been in business?
questions.answer: We're a fresh, dynamic startup founded in 2024. While we're new to the market, our team brings decades of combined experience from top tech companies and successful startups.

questions.question: What makes you different from established agencies?
questions.answer: As a new company, we offer fresh perspectives, cutting-edge approaches, and personalized attention that larger agencies can't match. We're agile, innovative, and deeply invested in each client's success.

questions.question: Do you have experience with our industry?
questions.answer: Our team has worked across various industries including healthcare, finance, e-commerce, and SaaS. We bring diverse experience and adapt quickly to new sectors and challenges.

questions.question: What's your team structure?
questions.answer: We're a lean, focused team with senior leadership across all key areas. This structure allows us to be nimble, cost-effective, and provide direct access to decision-makers.

questions.question: How do you ensure quality with a small team?
questions.answer: Our small team is our strength. Each member is a senior expert in their field, ensuring high-quality work. We also partner with trusted specialists when needed, maintaining our core team's focus and expertise.

questions.question: What's your pricing structure?
questions.answer: We offer competitive, transparent pricing tailored to each project. As a new company, we provide excellent value while maintaining high standards. We're happy to discuss custom packages that fit your budget.

questions.question: How do you handle project management?
questions.answer: We use modern project management tools and maintain regular communication with clients. Our small team ensures direct access to decision-makers and faster response times than larger agencies.

questions.question: What if we need to scale our project?
questions.answer: We're designed to grow with you. Our flexible team structure allows us to bring in specialized talent as needed, ensuring we can handle projects of any size while maintaining our personal touch.

jobs.title: Open Positions
jobs.description: Explore our current job openings and find the perfect role for your career growth.

items.title: Senior AI Engineer
items.description: We're looking for a passionate AI Engineer to join our team and help build cutting-edge AI solutions that transform businesses.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
5+ years of experience in machine learning and AI
Proficiency in Python, TensorFlow, and PyTorch
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)

items.title: UX/UI Designer
items.description: Join our design team to create beautiful, intuitive user experiences that delight our clients and drive business results.
requirements: Proficiency in Figma, Sketch, and Adobe Creative Suite
Experience with design systems and prototyping

items.title: Marketing Automation Specialist
items.description: Help us scale our marketing efforts through intelligent automation and data-driven strategies that drive growth.
requirements: Proficiency in HubSpot, Marketo, or similar platforms
Experience with email marketing and lead nurturing
Knowledge of marketing attribution and ROI analysis

cta.title: Don't See Your Role?
cta.description: We're always looking for talented individuals. Send us your resume and let us know how you can contribute to our team.
